* [Elections](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_secretary_test/elections/index.php)
* May¬†3,¬†2025¬†General¬†Election


May 3, 2025 - General Election
==============================

Dear DeSoto Residents,

We want to thank all who participated in the May 3, 2025 General Election. The results are in, and we are pleased to announce that Mayor Rachel L. Proctor has been re-elected and will continue serving as Mayor of DeSoto.

However, in the races for Councilmember Place 3 and Councilmember Place 5, no candidate received more than 50% of the vote. As a result, a runoff election will be held to determine the winners for both seats. The top two candidates in each race will advance to the runoff.

**Runoff Election Day**: Saturday, June 7, 2025

¬†We encourage all eligible voters to participate in this important upcoming election that will help shape the future of our city. Stay tuned for additional information, including early voting dates/times for the runoff election.

Thank you for your continued engagement!¬†

May 3, 2025: All DeSoto vote centers have been accounted for. Final results will be posted once final mail in ballots have been received by Dallas County Elections.  
![ED Results 7](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Document%20Center/Departments/Community%20Services/ED%20Results%207.png?t=202505040937010)  
![ED Results 8](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Document%20Center/Departments/Community%20Services/ED%20Results%208.png?t=202505040937250)  
  
Early Voting results for the May 3, 2025 General Election are now available. Election Day results will be released, beginning at approximately 9:00pm and every hour after that until all results have been uploaded. If you‚Äôd like to follow along on your own, you can view results on the Election Night Reporting link here:

https://www.dallascountyvotes.org/election-results/

Graphics below are from the 7:00pm Early Voting Results  
![EV Results 1](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Document%20Center/Departments/Community%20Services/EV%20Results%201.png?t=202505032016030) ¬†![EV Results 2](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Document%20Center/Departments/Community%20Services/EV%20Results%202.png?t=202505032016240)  
  
¬†[Notice of Deadline to File Applications](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Document%20Center/Government/Elections/2024-11-06%20NOTICE%20OF%20DEADLINE%20TO%20FILE%20APPLICATIONS%20FOR%20GENERAL%20ELECTION%20-%20May%202025%20Election.pdf?t=202411051249230)  
¬†[Notice of Candidate Ballot Drawing](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Document%20Center/Government/Elections/May%203,%202025/2025-02-21%20Candidate%20Ballot%20Drawing%20Notice.pdf?t=202501091735430)  
¬†[Ordinance Ordering the May 3, 2025 General Election](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/2426-25.pdf?t=202502162340210)  
¬†[Notice of Election - May 3, 2025 (English)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Notice%20of%20Election%20Publication%20for%20May%203,%202025%20General%20Election.pdf?t=202504031716420)  
¬†[Notice of Election - May 3, 2025 (Spanish)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Notice%20of%20Election%20Publication%20for%20May%203%202025%20General%20Election_Spanish.pdf?t=202504031717500)  
¬†[Notice of Election - May 3, 2025 (Vietnamese)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Notice%20of%20Election%20Publication%20for%20May%203%202025%20General%20Election_Vietnamese.pdf?t=202504031718220)  
¬†[Political Sign Guidelines for Candidates](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Political%20Sign%20Guidelines%20(Updated%20Logo).pdf?t=202502271821480)  
¬†[Political Advertising Information for Candidates - "What you Need to Know"](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Political%20Advertising%20Guideline%20-%20What%20You%20Need%20To%20Know%20-%20TEC%20(Updated%202019).pdf?t=202502271823470)  
[TxDot Information on Political Signs (Candidate Information)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/Document%20Center/Government/Elections/May%203,%202025/Political%20Signs%20TxDot%20Pamphlet.pdf?t=202502271825380)  
  
Early Voting and Election Day voting will be conducted at Disciple Central Community Church (Youth Room) located at 901 North Polk Street, Suite 101, DeSoto, Texas 75115.¬† You may alsovote at ANY participating Early Voting or Election Day location in Dallas County, regardless of your precinct. Choose the location that works best for your schedule and convenience!¬† **Click here for a list of early voting and election day vote center locations**: <https://www.dallascountyvotes.org/vote-centers/>  
  

![Screenshot 2025-04-21 141601](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Government/City%20Secretary/Screenshot%202025-04-21%20141601.png?t=202504211522060)  
[![CSO Website buttons (8)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Government/City%20Secretary/CSO%20Website%20buttons%20(8).png?t=202504031231190)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_secretary_test/elections/voting_locations.php)

The City of DeSoto will hold a **General Election on Saturday, May 3, 2025**, for the following positions:

[![CSO Website buttons (5)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Government/CSO%20Website%20buttons%20(5).png?t=202412300917590)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_secretary_test/elections/filing_requirements.php)

* **Mayor, Place 1**
* **Councilmember, Place 3**
* **Councilmember, Place 5**

üìã **Candidate Packets Available:** Starting Thursday, January 2, 2025.  
üóìÔ∏è **Application Filing Period:** **FILING PERIOD HAS ENDED.**   
January 15, 2025 ‚Äì February 14, 2025. (*Office Hours: 9:00am ‚Äì 12 noon, 1:00pm - 4:30pm; lunch period from 12pm ‚Äì¬† ¬† ¬† 1pm*)  
  
***Candidate packets are available by request to the City Secretary's office at 972.230.9664, in-person.¬† You may also request a candidate packet by email to: candidateinfo@desototexas.gov.  
Packets must be returned by the deadline, in person*** ***or*** ***by email (ONLY if application is filed with petition in lieu of filing fee)***

‚è≥ **Deadline to Submit Applications:**  
No applications will be accepted after **5:00 PM on Friday, February 14, 2025**.
